sn36.21:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn36.21:4.2: Atha kho moḷiyasīvako paribbājako yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn36.21:4.4: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn36.21:4.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho moḷiyasīvako paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn36.21:4.6: “santi, bho gotama, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṃvādino evaṃdiṭṭhino:
sn36.21:4.7: ‘yaṃ kiñcāyaṃ purisapuggalo paṭisaṃvedeti sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā sabbaṃ taṃ pubbekatahetū’ti.
sn36.21:4.8: Idha bhavaṃ gotamo kimāhā”ti?
sn36.21:5.1: * “Pittasamuṭṭhānānipi kho, sīvaka, idhekaccāni vedayitāni uppajjanti.
sn36.21:5.2: Sāmampi kho etaṃ, sīvaka, veditabbaṃ yathā pittasamuṭṭhānānipi idhekaccāni vedayitāni uppajjanti.
sn36.21:5.3: Lokassapi kho etaṃ, sīvaka, saccasammataṃ yathā pittasamuṭṭhānānipi idhekaccāni vedayitāni uppajjanti.
sn36.21:5.4: Tatra, sīvaka, ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṃvādino evaṃdiṭṭhino:
sn36.21:5.5: ‘yaṃ kiñcāyaṃ purisapuggalo paṭisaṃvedeti sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā sabbaṃ taṃ pubbekatahetū’ti.
sn36.21:5.6: Yañca sāmaṃ ñātaṃ tañca atidhāvanti, yañca loke saccasammataṃ tañca atidhāvanti.
sn36.21:6.7: kammavipākajānipi kho, sīvaka, idhekaccāni vedayitāni uppajjanti.
sn36.21:6.12: tatra, sīvaka, ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṃvādino evaṃdiṭṭhino:
sn36.21:6.13: ‘yaṃ kiñcāyaṃ purisapuggalo paṭisaṃvedeti sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā sabbaṃ taṃ pubbekatahetū’ti.
sn36.21:6.14: Yañca sāmaṃ ñātaṃ tañca atidhāvanti yañca loke saccasammataṃ tañca atidhāvanti.
sn36.21:7.1: Evaṃ vutte, moḷiyasīvako paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn36.21:7.2: “abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama, abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama … pe …
sn36.21:7.3: upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
